Name: Dog Theatre
About the game: Dog Theatre is a quick and simple endless runner that will put your reflexes and skills to the test as you run along the stage dodging all kinds of obstacles. Suit up Jack, get on the stage and show the audience what you are made of. Random generated levels New and different challenges each level Find boost food to help you on stage Collect food and beat challenges to unlock different hats for your dogs Hats and breeds that change game mechanics
